name: Divide Numbers
description:
Divide Numbers is a unique and tricky math puzzle game only for the smartest people!

Use division to solve chains of blocks, but be careful that you don’t run out of space.

Build up your chains and reach the top of the high score list. Only the best get above 1000 points.

Divide Numbers is great and fun training of your math and logical skills. Perfect for young, old or anyone interested in math and games.

【Features】
▲Easy to learn, difficult to master
▲All about math and division skills. Is your strategy smart enough?
▲Simple, beautiful design
